name: You've Got To Pick A Pocket Or Screw
name_original: You've Got To Pick A Pocket Or Screw
description:
The escape is planned, but you're gonna need some key-cards to pull it off.

Steal 6 key-cards from the screws and don't get caught. You can only carry one card at a time (of course...) and they need to be stashed in your bed.

A new screw will appear whenever one of the big, red emergency buttons are pressed (max 5 at a time)

Once a guard is card-less, bump them off by landing on their head.

Cursor keys or ASDW move the lag.

SPACEBAR to steal a key-card.

This was made in a horrible rush for the first ScoreSpace Speed Jam!

The sounds were all made with ChipTone (https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone)
